title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.1 - License required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.1 - License required

State Regulations

No person, firm, partnership, organization, association, joint venture, corporation or other business entity shall sell or distribute
games of chance supplies, devices or equipment to any authorized organization
licensed to conduct games of chance, or a licensed authorized games of chance
lessor, without having first obtained a license therefor as provided in the

Games of Chance Licensing Law and this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4607.1

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
